FiscalYearSettings.name: FiscalYearSettings
FiscalYearSettings.description: Settings to define a custom or standard fiscal year for your organization. This object has a parent-child relationship with the Period object.

EndDate.description: End date of the fiscal year.

IsStandardYear.description: Indicates whether the fiscal year is a standard calendar year (true) or a custom fiscal year (false).

Name.description: A name for the fiscal year. Limit: 80 characters.

PeriodId.description: ID of the associated fiscal period.

PeriodLabelScheme.description: The numbering scheme used for fiscal periods.

PeriodPrefix.description: The prefix of fiscal periods. For example, if p is the prefix, then the first period is “P1.”

QuarterLabelScheme.description: The numbering scheme used for fiscal quarters.

QuarterPrefix.description: The prefix of fiscal quarters. For example, if “Q” is the prefix, then the fourth quarter would be “Q4.”

StartDate.description: Start date of the fiscal year.

WeekLabelScheme.description: The numbering scheme used for weeks.

WeekStartDay.description: The name of the day that starts the week, for example Monday or Sunday

YearType.description: Indicates one of two types of fiscal years, Standard or Custom. Standard denotes the standard Gregorian calendar, while Custom means a fiscal year with a custom structure.
